thread.title: Microsoft raises dividend 16 percent to 36 cents
thread.title_full: Microsoft raises dividend 16 percent to 36 cents

author: The Associated Press
title: Microsoft raises dividend 16 percent to 36 cents
text:
Microsoft raises dividend 16 percent to 36 cents Associated Press | 0 comments 
Microsoft is raising its quarterly dividend 16 percent to 36 cents a share. 
The Redmond, Washington, company said Tuesday it will pay the new rate Dec. 10 to shareholders of record Nov. 19. kAm|:4C@D@7E r@CA] =2DE $6AE6>36C :?4C62D65 :ED 5:G:56?5 E@ b` 46?ED 7C@> ag 46?ED]k^Am kAm$92C6D @7 E96 E649?@=@8J 8:2?E 4=@D65 EC25:?8 2E Scb]hg[ FA hc 46?ED[ @C a]a A6C46?E] u@C E96 J62C E@ 52E6[ |:4C@D@7E D92C6D 2C6 5@H? 23@FE d A6C46?E]k^Am Â© 2015 The Associated Press.
